title: Learn about the interpretation of potatoes in a dream from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about eating potatoes in a dream and sweet potatoes in a dream

preview.html: Potatoes in dreams have many meanings that vary among dream interpreters because they are a wonderful source of food that provides the body with the necessary elements. Some may see it in bad condition or have some mold or its vision varies from fried to roasted and more, and we will learn together about the interpretations of seeing potatoes from all sides. Potatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Potatoes in a dream Some interpreters said that seeing it means that there are many obstacles in the dreamer's way and he must be patient before taking the next step and it is better to study it well before anything else. Interpretation of a dream about potatoes means that a man must be a fighter and brave and not stop if he sees what stands in his way, but he must have a spirit of perseverance until he reaches his desired goals. In a married man's dream, this can mean stability of conditions and marital reassurance that he lives, especially if he finds it in its land without leaving it. As for removing it from its source in the dream of a person who has a family and children, this means that there will be many disturbances that may eventually lead to divorce. Some interpreters said that seeing it cooked is good news for achieving dreams and fulfilling desires that a person has always tried to achieve without fatigue or boredom. Eating it in a couple's dream is a good sign of the end of a period full of tensions and the end of fears arising from the accumulation of debts Or other reasons. Seeing him washing potatoes and removing dirt from them is a good sign of radical and positive changes in the dreamer's life and the happiness that awaits him in the future with a partner. Or it was said: Washing is purification from sins, and giving up bad deeds and sayings. Potatoes in a dream by Ibn Sirin Among the interpreters who indicated the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream is Imam Ibn Sirin, who indicated that it brings great harm if he sees them baked or cut by the dreamer during his sleep, and here are his statements in detail: Seeing an unmarried girl in this dream is a sign that she is suffering from a delay in her marriage for some time and God, Lord of the Worlds, must count on her to bless her with kindness. As for the one who saw her getting married and cutting her into small pieces, he suffers from some disturbances in his life, related to losses in money or worries and responsibilities added to his shoulders. One of the positive elements in the dream is seeing him wash or peel them, as the vision indicates the good that awaits him because he is taking important steps on the right path. You have a dream that confuses you, wait for it .. Google Egyptian dream interpretation site. Potatoes in a dream for a single woman differed Interpreters about the girl who saw potatoes in her dream. Some of them said that it is a sign of her strength and courage in facing the problems and crises she faces, such as Fahd Al-Osaimi, while Ibn Sirin said that it is a sign of the many problems that she must face calmly until they pass peacefully. Al-Osaimi said that it indicates the proximity of her marriage to a moral and religious person, especially if she sees that he eats it grilled and feels its delicious taste. Seeing potatoes planted in the ground and she does not try to approach them or uproot them indicates her fear of the future

Interpreters disagreed about the girl who saw potatoes in her dream. Among them are those who said that it is a sign of her strength and courage in facing the problems and crises that she faces, such as Fahd Al-Osaimi, while Ibn Sirin said that it is a sign of the many problems that she must face calmly in order for them to pass peacefully. Al-Osaimi said that it indicates the proximity of her marriage to a moral and religious person, especially If she sees that he is eating it grilled and feels its delicious taste. Seeing potatoes planted in the ground and not trying to approach them or uproot them indicates her fear of the future.

title: Seeing a sewing machine in a dream. Interpretation of the machine in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a sewing machine shows a good spirit and shows intimacy, repairing relationships, and other interpretations that we will explain to single people, married people, pregnant women, and divorced women, such as buying a sewing machine, sewing cloth, or sewing a green dress, and sewing with a machine, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and others. Interpretation of the sewing machine in a dream. The sewing machine in a dream, and it looks good. It indicates that the owner of the vision is a hardworking person who has patience, will, determination, and morals, and it indicates that the owner of the vision has great faith and religiosity. It also indicates health, happiness, and freedom from debts and diseases. It also indicates that he is always next to his family and works to help them and tries to give them the best he can. Whoever dreams that he is sewing and does not sew well, then he wants to collect what is scattered and not gather it, and if he sees that he is sewing his wife’s clothes, He is subject to trial. But Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of sewing and said that the sewing machine in a dream shows familiarity and agreement between people. Perhaps the vision indicates the author and the one he marries. His vision indicates the one who realizes what he neglected, or the one who repents for what he did. If the tailor is sewing for himself, then he will create a world for himself in Salah al-Din, and if he sees that he is sewing and is not good at sewing, then he wants to collect the scattered things and He can, and if he sees that he is sewing a dress for a woman, then his heart will break. Dreaming about a sewing machine means that you want to fix a problem related to a situation or that you want to enter into a new relationship. Seeing a sewing machine in a dream If you sew a lot of different fabrics, this may represent your need to find a compromise With someone in your personal or professional life. Seeing a sewing machine in your dream means that you may have to make an effort to restore something to normal. This may include mending a relationship with someone, repairing a company, or something similar. Torn clothes can be sewn with a machine in a dream. The vision tells you to be more humble in your life to make the most of the things you have instead of looking for something new. A sewing machine can indicate that you need To be more economical in spending your money, and the vision shows that you need to be more flexible while facing problems and obstacles. Dreaming about a sewing machine means that you may need to be more self-sufficient instead of relying on others. The dream also tells you that you may need to To trust yourself more than the people around you. If you get a sewing machine, you may need more confidence in your ability to create something new and useful. If this confidence is built, who knows where it could lead you.If you are sewing a dress from scratch, you may want to change yourself in a big way. Maybe you have been working hard to do this and are starting to see results. If you had a sewing machine in your dream, you may feel that you have the ability to fix things whenever you need to. The dream also tells you that you have the skills to be able to fix things when you face challenges. It may represent a sewing machine Sewing in your dream is evidence of regaining something in your life that you do not want.in reality

title: Interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a snake in a dream. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of the snake in a dream. Some see in its presence something bad that brings misery to its owner, others see that it shows something good, such as earning money or high positions. Interpretation of a snake in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen saw that seeing a snake or snake It indicates the presence of a cunning enemy for the dreamer. As for the one who sees that he killed a snake or snake in a dream, he will be able to confront his enemy in reality and defeat him in a crushing defeat, but if he kills the snake and throws it with his hand, it indicates victory over the enemies and robbing them of all their money and wealth. But if the dreamer sees that his words are alive with good and kind words, then this indicates the appearance of goodness and benefit. Whoever sees a snake made of metal, it is good, and if it is made of gold or silver, then it is better. Interpretation of seeing a snake by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of a snake in a dream is considered one of the most important interpretations that many have explained. Among the commentators, Ibn Sirin believes that the snake is an enemy and that the large number of snakes expresses the large number of enemies, because Satan brought them to our master Adam and was able to enter Paradise. He also believes that the amount of hostility for each snake varies according to its shape, the strength of its bones, and its thickness. He also believes that snakes indicate infidels. And adulterers and murderers, because murderers often kill with the poison of a snake. The snake can be evidence that it is the power and status of the dreamer, or it can be a wife and a son, and the Qur’an also describes women and children who can be enemies of the man in many cases. It is also seen that from If he fought a snake or argued with it in his dream, this indicates that he succeeded in defeating his enemy. He also sees that eating a snake in a dream shows good things that will happen to a person and opportunities to obtain them. A lot of money, prestige, and pleasure in his life, but if the dreamer cuts the snake into two equal or unequal halves, he can triumph over his enemies. As for his lively speech with kind and gentle words, this indicates people’s love for the dreamer and their admiration for his deeds and deeds. However, if a person sees the snake while it is dead, this indicates Against the most powerful and cruelest enemies. Hate and hatred, and seeing snakes killed and slaughtered in places of buying and selling, this indicates the emergence of war and victory over enemies. Interpretation of seeing a smooth snakeThe interpretation of a snake in a dream will differ from one interpreter to another, due to the different shapes of snakes. If one sees a large black snake, this means that the dreamer He will lead deadly armies. If the snake is soft and calm and does not harm him, this indicates that he has obtained one of the treasures of kings. As for whoever sees a snake and is afraid of it and does not look at it from the base to know, its appearance indicates that he is safe from his enemy. And if he sees the snake emerging from a stream Urine, this indicates the imminent birth of a new baby from the family. Interpretation of seeing a descending snake in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation. Al-Nabulsi believes that if the dreamer sees a snake descending from a high place, this indicates the death of the head of that place. As for the dreamer’s vision of his garden full of snakes, the orchard growing, and the plants dying

When an unmarried girl sees that she found gold in a dream, she may It represents the money and livelihood that you will obtain, God willing. If the dreamer sees buried gold bullion, this may indicate money that he obtained through fraud or fraud, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream in which I found fifty pounds in a dream. Interpretation of dreams: I received fifty pounds in a dream to see fifty One pound can mean sustenance and blessing, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees fifty kilograms in a dream, this indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. title: Interpretation of a dream about a military session and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a military march. One of the policies of any country is the presence of the military side in it, which is the army and the police in their various forms, and the army is a basic pillar of the state, so it is not permissible for a country to do that. It exists without an army, and any country conducts military courses every season to enroll young people in the army and announces a period before that when this course is for young people to be able to join it. There are countries that have compulsory conscription for young people from the age of 18, where the basics of battle and self-defense and homeland are taught, so what It is the interpretation of a dream about military march. Interpretation of a dream about entering a military course. Joining the army works to strengthen the body and also strengthens the personality. It also gives the person self-confidence and a high degree of responsibility and commitment. The interpretation of this vision shows the extent of the person’s commitment to his responsibilities: The man triumphs over his enemies and takes control when he dreams. By entering into the military career. Likewise, a person lives happily and righteousness enters his life when he sees in his dream that he is entering the military career. This person also possesses high mental strength and thinks wisely if he sees in a dream that he is entering the military career. Moreover, the unmarried young man He will get married soon when he sees in his dream that he is joining the army. Likewise, a pregnant woman who is approaching her due date and is enduring hardship in her pregnancy dreams of joining the army. A man will also get up to work when he sees in a dream that he is entering the military career. Moreover, his son will have offspring. Valid and he will be fair to him, when he sees in a dream that his son is joining the army. The Military Police Academy is a dream for many young people and they try to join it, and they consider it one of the highest things they are trying to achieve. To her: A young man achieves all his goals and ambitions when he dreams of enrolling in a military school. Likewise, he triumphs over his enemies and conquers them, if in his dream he sees himself enrolling in a military school. Also, a person has the ability to fight enemies when he dreams of enrolling in a military school. Then he triumphs over his enemies and defeats them. When he sees in a dream that he has been accepted and entered the military college. Likewise, a man is honored in his work and promoted, when he sees in a dream that he is performing military parades. A man also has the ability to endure hardships and face problems in his life when he sees in a dream that he has been accepted into a military school. In addition In addition, a single girl approaches her marriage when she sees a military college in her dream. Likewise, a man lives his life happily and gets rid of his worries when he sees a military school in his dream. Escaping from the army is a sign To escape from something that the person does not want, as well as a sign of escaping from someone or something that he or she fears, as well as getting rid of the worries that affected him: Seeing him escaping from the army indicates that this person is straying from

title: Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream or a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. A pregnant woman seeing that she has had an abortion in a dream can be a vision that is not strange and is often a reflection of the state of fear and anxiety that she is experiencing. Likewise, feeling anxious about the meaning of the dream and its interpretation, but the interpretation of the vision, on the contrary, can often have promising connotations, and interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of a miscarriage in a dream according to the state of the vision and its circumstances, and whether she was single, married, pregnant, or divorced today, through the Vision website. We will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman based on the opinion of leading commentators. Such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream? Ibn Sirin: Seeing a miscarriage in a dream indicates many problems and pressures that the dreamer experienced at that time. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream shows that the dreamer will soon get rid of it. From all the sadness and anxiety he feels. Seeing a miscarriage in a single woman’s dream may indicate that she will soon marry someone she loves. Seeing a miscarriage in a dream for an unmarried woman who needs to have surgery announces that she will divorce her loved one because of the many problems they face with each other. What is the interpretation of seeing a miscarriage for a non-pregnant woman in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing a miscarriage of the fetus, seeing blood, and not seeing the fetus. It indicates the fulfillment of something that the dreamer had hoped for and expected, or it indicates the abundant goodness that she will obtain. Seeing a miscarriage with bleeding in a dream indicates sins. Which the dreamer committed or suggests that she is wasting her money in vain. What is the interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a married woman who is not pregnant: Seeing a married woman pregnant and having a miscarriage in a dream remembers that she will announce her pregnancy soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman pregnant and having a miscarriage in a dream may be a reflection of the latent desire to become pregnant soon. Seeing a married woman who is pregnant and having a miscarriage in a dream indicates the worries and problems that he has suffered from and will get rid of them as soon as possible. Seeing a married woman who is pregnant and having a miscarriage and does not feel any pain indicates the happiness and success that she will obtain and the ease and comfort that she will obtain. Seeing a married woman who is pregnant and having a miscarriage And you feel pain in the dream. It shows that he will face some problems as a result of an action he did in the past. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pen or pencil in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a miscarriage in a dream for a single woman: For a single woman to see that she is pregnant and has a miscarriage in a dream, it indicates the many difficulties and problems that stand in her way, but she You will succeed in overcoming it. A single woman seeing that she is pregnant and having a miscarriage in a dream shows that he will be free of all sadness or problems and that he will gain happiness soon. An unmarried woman seeing that she is pregnant and miscarried and felt pain in a dream indicates that she feels remorse for something she did in the past or indicates An obstacle will appear in her path. A single woman saw that she was pregnant, so she aborted the fetus, and she saw the fetus after death

title: Interpretation of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream - Seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream

preview.html: The dream of Muhammad, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him and his family, Muhammad Al-Mustafa, seeing the Messenger Muhammad of a single, married, pregnant, and divorced woman, a man, Ibn Sirin, and others. Interpretation of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. I heard the Messenger of God, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, say: Whoever sees me in a dream is as if he saw me awake, for Satan does not imitate me. Whoever sees me He saw the truth, and whoever sees me in a dream will not enter Hell. He said: The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Whoever sees me in a dream will not enter Hell. God sent Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, as a mercy to the worlds. If he sees him in debt, God will pay his debt to him, and if he sees him sick, God heals him, and if he sees a warrior, God helps him, and if he sees him, he makes a pilgrimage home, and if he sees him, he sees. In a barren, fertile land, or in a place where injustice is widespread instead of injustice and justice, or in a place that frightens his family. And if he sees him pale in color, emaciated, or missing some limbs, this indicates the weakness of religion in that place and the emergence of heresies, and the same applies if he sees worn out clothes. If he saw that she drank his blood out of love in secret, she would be martyred in jihad. If he saw that he drank in public, this indicates his hypocrisy, and he entered into the blood of his family and helped kill them. If he sees him as if he was sick, then he has recovered from his illness, and the people of that place will be reconciled after the corruption. If he sees him, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, riding, then he visits his grave. If he sees him walking, then he goes to visit him on foot. If he sees him standing, his orders and the orders of the Imam of his time will be corrected. He saw him calling the ruined place. According to Omar, the place is the interpretation of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. The Prophet says: Whoever sees me in a dream, it is as if he saw me awake, because Satan does not imitate me, and whoever sees me has seen the truth. Faith is good news for those who saw the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, that he would not enter Hell. The dream will not enter hell. The Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Whoever sees him in debt, God has closed his debt, whoever sees him sick, God will heal him and heal him, whoever sees him a happy and joyful pilgrimage to the Holy House of God, and whoever sees him and the withdrawal of his land, his land. It will be green, and whoever sees it drinking its blood out of love for it will fight and be martyred. Whoever sees him traveling visits Mustafa’s grave as a traveller, and whoever sees him walking on one leg visits the Sacred House on one leg, and whoever sees him calling the call to a place that contains the ruins of that place’s time, and it has become one of the most beautiful places. Tahir al-Din. And whoever sees him at his funeral at some point, a misfortune has occurred up to that point, and whoever sees him as if he visited his grave, a lot of money will befall him, and a lot of goodness will befall him according to what he was given, and whoever sees in a dream that he is the father of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, This indicates the weakness of his faith, as well as the vision of the Messenger. May God bless him and grant him peace, it is not just about one person, but rather it applies to all Muslims, it is good for everyone. And if it is the opposite, then it belongs to everyone. Whoever saw the Prophet, may God’s prayers and peace be upon him, being relieved after distress and paying off his debt, and if he was imprisoned or restricted, then he would save him from his imprisonment and from his restrictions, and he would be him. He is safe from his fear, even if he is in hardship and drought, grace and goodness will be abundant for him, and if he is rich, he will become richer. Abu Hurairah, may God be pleased with him, said: I heard the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace

title: Interpretation of seeing a mouse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing mice in one's fingers has many different meanings and interpretations that vary from one vision to another, due to the different events that occur during it, as well as the state of the viewer and different rulings or circumstances that can greatly affect dreams. You see, and through our article we will explain the most important interpretations shown in interpreting seeing a rat in a dream in all cases. Seeing rats in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a large rat in a dream is evidence of the difficulties that the dreamer will face in his life soon. Seeing a small rat in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, enemies are always present around the dreamer and he must be careful. A rat in a dream indicates the psychological state that the viewer feels and does not know how to get out. Seeing rats in a single woman’s dream: Seeing a large rat in a dream for a single woman means that she will face some difficulties in Achieving the dreams that we seek. Seeing a single woman in a dream killing a large rat means that she will get rid of the fears that she is currently suffering from and will achieve her big dream. A single woman who sees in a dream that there is a large rat in the house indicates that she is currently feeling a bad psychological state and is not... Her ability to overcome it on her own. Seeing a small mouse walking on the ground means that an unmarried woman will soon face a big problem because of people close to her. Seeing mice in a dream for a married woman Seeing a small mouse in a dream for a married woman and feeling happy means that she will suffer from some problems that she does not You know how dangerous it is. If a married woman dreams of seeing a small rat, this is evidence that she will get out of some of the difficulties she faces in reality. For a married woman to dream of seeing a large rat attacking her, this means that she will face many problems with her husband, which will make her feel sad and sad. A black rat in a dream is considered evidence of the presence of many difficulties that hinder her life during this period and her inability to adapt. Seeing a green rat is a sign of goodness and blessing that she will receive soon. Interpretation of seeing a gray rat in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a gray rat in a dream It means that there are many different changes that will happen in the dreamer's life soon. Seeing a gray rat in a dream for a married woman and feeling afraid indicates the financial problems she is currently facing and the difficulty of overcoming them. A married woman who sees in her dream that there is a small gray rat in her house, means She will hear some bad news that will cause her sadness. A gray rat in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will fail to achieve some of the ambitions she seeks during this period and the many efforts she is making for them. Seeing a rat in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a black rat in a dream for a pregnant woman means She will face some health problems during this period, which will put her in a state of sadness and excessive psychological exhaustion. A small gray mouse in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates some...

title: Seeing someone barefoot in a dream

preview.html: And that this dream is one of the dreams that makes whoever sees it confused about whether this dream is a dream that brings goodness or vice versa, and from our website gptafser.com/ we will present it in detail.Interpretation of seeing a person barefoot in a dream for a single girl. An unmarried girl dreams of seeing a person barefoot in a dream. The dream. It is just an indication that this person is suffering from a major financial problem and that God is the Most High and All-Knowing. The person in the dream who is barefoot is a dream that can be interpreted depending on the problems he is going through in his life. It means that the girl is married if she sees herself barefoot and running in The street in a dream. The vision indicates that he is looking for someone who thinks about him a lot in reality. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that she is barefoot, and holding her shoes in her hand in a dream. The vision may indicate solving the problem, but he is not interested in this matter. And in the event that she sees She is barefoot on one foot, and the other is wearing her shoes in a single girl’s dream. The vision indicated that you will marry someone and you may not be satisfied with him in waking life. Seeing a single girl can symbolize being barefoot and running in the mud in a dream. This is evidence that they are facing a problem Very large. But if you get out of the mud easily, then this problem will end with the grace of Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about taking off shoes: They are feet in an unmarried girl’s dream. An indication that she is not making the right decisions in her fateful life decisions, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Walking barefoot Feet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a person barefoot in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is barefoot, she is bound by the following conditions: Like a married woman, if she suffers from some debts or financial difficulties in her life, and she sees that she is barefoot in a dream. The vision made it clear that he will be freed from these debts in Soon, God willing. And if she saw that she was barefoot in the mud, and did not dream with a married woman. The vision indicated some major problems in her life, and God knows best. Or if she saw that she was barefoot, and searched for her shoes in the married woman’s dream. The vision may indicate There are ways to solve the problems that arise between her and her husband. Perhaps the vision indicates that her husband is the one who wants to please her husband in all circumstances. And the dream of a married woman being barefoot in a dream. Its meaning is that he is able to solve all his problems on his own, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Seeing a married woman symbolizes Until she wears her shoes in a dream. They live in peace and stability, thanks to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing a person barefoot in a dream about a man and its meaning About seeing a married man barefoot in a dream. It is one of the signs that indicates the presence of financial hardship or debt in a person’s life with bare feet. Whereas if a married man sees that he is barefoot in a dream, the vision may indicate some harm that will befall the dreamer, and God is the Most High. And if a married man sees himself running in the street barefoot in a dream, its meaning is the prestigious status that the dreamer acquires among the people. Perhaps Refers to seeing running barefoot in a man's dream
